Interface VRMCSpringBone

SpringBone makes objects such as costumes and hair swaying

interface VRMCSpringBone {
    colliderGroups?: SpringBoneColliderGroup[];
    colliders?: SpringBoneCollider[];

    };
    extras?: any;

}
